name: Akame
quote: Real sins cannot be atoned for.

name: Dante
quote: A kind hand is like a ray of light

name: Eren
quote: This world is distorted. What is right and what is wrong - the difference is not so easy to see.

name: Kira
quote: The most important thing is that only through trials can one gain greater strength.

name: Lelouch
quote: It all starts with awareness of your own weaknesses.

name: Nori
quote: Oh, these teenagers! They think that the main thing is to have more friends. One is enough. Only one, but yours.

name: Rem
quote: A person can die from a huge number of reasons. For example, a gunshot wound, a fatal disease... Loneliness...

name: Rubi
quote: I'd rather regret what I did than what I couldn't do when I had the chance.

name: Sakata
quote: If you get offended when people call you weak, then you are a real weakling.

name: Yasu
quote: If you don't know something, study it.
